resources.string: Select the correct images from below and confirm with the "OK" button
Remember the order of the images above
Your order was correct. Try again with less time!
Correct again. You won the game! Your highscore is:\u0020
Your order was not correct. Try again!
You made too many mistakes! You lost the game!
This game consists in recognizing the color of the words shown on the screen. Once the word is shown, you have to say the correct colour in a limited period of time.

The goal of the game is to remember the order of the colors in the time limit shown in the upper right corner. After the time has passed, you need to drag and drop the images from the bottom into the panels above in the order you remembered. Once all the images are put, press the OK button. If your order was correct, the time limit will decrease.
You need to fill the gaps in the words with some of the letters you have at choice
Decide if the two images are the same or not. Push the correct button every time.
The time ran out! Game over. Your highscore is:\u0020

The goal of the game is to tell for as many pictures as possible if they match or not. You always have to compare the two pictures on the very left, that are a bit bigger than the rest. The other pictures serve as a queue to already know beforehand if the next comparisons match. To tell if the pictures match, you need to press the button "Match" if they match, and the button "No Match" if not. In the difficulty easy, you have more time to win points (40 seconds), but a match is worth less points (2 points). In the difficulties normal and expert you have less time (30 and 20 respectively), but win more points (4 and 6 respectively).
